long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A lightweight extension that helps save tabs as bookmarks.

Linklet is here to keep your workflow in order. It is user friendly, simple to use, lightweight with a lot of planned upcoming updates.

FEATURES
> Bookmarks any input link
> Bookmarks the current tab
> Clear the Bookmarks to get a clean space

UPCOMING FEATURES
> Folders
> Ability to divide links by color
> More customization options
> Homepage Website

HOW TO USE LINKLET
> To save any custom link, copy it and paste it into the input box. Click 'Save Input'
> To save the link of the current tab, just click 'Save Tab'
> To clean the list up/delete the list, double click 'Delete All'

FEEDBACK AND BUG REPORTS
If you're having issues or found a bug, please don't post the bug report here, contact us directly so we can fix it: pratyushk.dev@gmail.com

Enjoying Linklet?  Please rate us!
If you're not fully satisfied, please contact us at pratyushk.dev@gmail.com and we'll make sure to help :)
